content: So let there be no doubt: Islam is a part of America. And I believe that America holds within her the truth that regardless of race, religion, or station in life, all of us share common aspirations – to live in peace and security; to get an education and to work with dignity; to love our families, our communities, and our God. These things we share. This is the hope of all humanity.
translations: ita:Quindi, non ci sia dubbio﹕ l'Islam è parte integrante dell'America. E io credo che l'America custodisca al proprio inter
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by saeb (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
